Episode.GuestStars: |Alex Orthwein|Alexis Bronkovic|Becky Ann Baker|Daniel Cosgrove|Desi Waters|Fiona Dourif|Frank Wood|Jayson Wesley|Joe Lisi|Juan Carlos Díaz|Kelley Curran|Ken Leung|LisaGay Hamilton|P.J. Marshall|Patricia R. Floyd|
Episode.Overview: When Red is sent to a federal medical institution following his request to the court for a psychiatric evaluation, Liz and Jennifer use his time away to search for a Blacklister they believe may have valuable information about Red’s past.
